detail_desc: Screw-top water bottle in stainless steel with a matt finish. Capacity 490 ml.
Short, fitted, off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with wide foldover ribbing and long sleeves.
LOVE STORIES x H&M. Thong briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
5-pocket slim-fit shorts in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and button.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidery detail on the chest and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Ankle-length trousers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and straight legs with creases and visible zips at the hems.

Jacket in woven fabric with a water-repellent coating. Stand-up collar with a zip at the back and a hood that can be concealed in the collar, and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Chest and front pockets with a flap and press-studs, concealed side pockets behind the front pockets and two inner pockets. Adjustable press-stud fastening at the cuffs. Detachable, quilted lining in a viscose weave and a polyester filling.
Boots with lacing at the front, a zip in the side and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles.
Hoop earrings and a hairclip in metal with shell-shaped decorations. Length of earrings 5 cm, length of hairclip 10 cm.
Top in airy jersey crêpe with a V-neck, short cap sleeves and a small stand-up collar with gathers at the back of the neck.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Dress in an airy cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Buttons at the back, short, flounce-trimmed sleeves, a gathered seam at the top and a flared skirt. Lining in a cotton weave.
Hooded sports top in airy, fast-drying jersey with raglan sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and a drawstring at the hem.
Long-sleeved dress in sturdy, textured jersey made from an organic cotton blend with a round neck, seam and flared skirt. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Unlined.
Straight-cut tunic in a lightweight cotton weave with embroidered details. Opening at the front with narrow twisted ties at the top and raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Maxi skirt in an airy weave made from a viscose blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and gently flared skirt with seams and gathers to add width. Unlined.

Wide trousers in sturdy cotton twill with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly and slightly lower crotch. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and leg pockets with a folded edge. Wide legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket, jetted front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Fastening with one button at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This, combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves, creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Knee-length satin skirt with a high, elasticated waist and pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved, polo-neck top in soft Tencel™ lyocell jersey.
Short-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey with a hood, print motif, seam at the hips and gently flared skirt.
Straight-cut coat in a wool blend with a shawl collar, dropped shoulders and discreet side pockets. No fasteners. Unlined.

Padded parka in woven fabric with imitation leather details and a detachable, pile-lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim. High stand-up collar, a zip and wind flap with buttons down the front, flap front pockets with a button, handwarmer pockets with press-studs, a zipped pocket on one sleeve and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.

Soft, non-wired bra top in ribbed jersey with lace sections. Wide shoulder straps, jersey-lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and covered elastication at the hem. No fasteners.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, long legs and press-stud fastenings.
Ballet pumps with pointed toes, open wrapover sides and elastication at the heel. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
Short, off-the-shoulder jumper in a rib-knit cotton blend with a V-neck front and back and long sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a glow-in-the-dark print on the front and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the joggers is organic.
Ankle-length trousers in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim with a high waist, detachable tie belt, zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and wide, straight legs.
Cardigan in fine-knit cotton with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and a fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Top in cotton jersey with a motif on the front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Slightly rounded hem.
Cotton cap with a sweatband inside in a cotton weave, and elastication at the back.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft viscose blend with an embroidered motif at the top and long sleeves. Longer layer in woven fabric at the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fine-knit socks with a scalloped edge.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Faux shearling linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with reversible sequins on the front (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins), and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Set of three different shades of peel-off nail polish. 3x6 ml. Easy to remove – no nail polish remover required.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise, elastication at the top, narrow shoulder straps and wide sleeves.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim. Slightly looser fit with an extra-high waist, button fly and straight legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Leggings in ribbed jersey with ribbing and a decorative bow with pompoms at the waist. Sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Boxy-style cardigan in a soft rib knit with a V-neck, large buttons down the front, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Hipster briefs in microfibre and lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Sports socks in fast-drying functional fabric with ventilating hole-knit sections over the feet. The polyester content of the socks is recycled.
Short skirt in airy, patterned crêpe with smocking at the waist. Jersey lining.
Shorts in woven fabric. High waist with elastication at the back, pleats at the front and a detachable tie belt. Zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, and side pockets.
Fine-knit sports socks with a ribbed shaft. The polyester content of the socks is partly recycled.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons down the front and short slits in the sides. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Pull-on trousers in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Dungaree shorts in woven fabric with a double-layered front and open back. Shoulder straps with adjustable fasteners, a tie belt at the waist and concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Short, fitted jersey dress with long sleeves and a visible zip at the back. Unlined.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist and wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique. Key pocket in the waistband.
Trainers in mesh with rubber details, a padded top edge, lacing at the front and a loop front and back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Short-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey with short frill trims around the neckline and sleeves.
NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. 5-pocket shorts in soft, stretch denim with print motifs, an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button and raw-edge, frayed hems.
Jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in soft viscose jersey in a narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps and an opening and ties at the back of the neck. Lined at the top.
5-pocket, low-rise jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, and super-skinny legs.
Top in soft, printed jersey with appliqués on the front, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and fringing at the hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton and modal blend with a high, ribbed collar, long sleeves and ribbing around the cuffs and hem.
Blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front, tie belt at the waist and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.

Wide, calf-length, off-the-shoulder dress in an airy cotton weave. Elastication and a small frill trim at the top, 3/4-length voluminous sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs, and a seam at the hips. Unlined.

Short, straight-cut jacket in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Shoulder tabs with a button, large flap chest pockets with a button and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Unlined.
Shorter polo-neck jumper in a rib knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and roll-edges around the neck, cuffs and hem.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.

Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, French front and straight-cut hem. Relaxed Fit – a straight fit with good room for movement creating a comfortable, relaxed silhouette.
Long-sleeved dress in a viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a gathered seam under the bust, front and back.
Long T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric in a slim fit at the top. Wide waistband with a concealed key pocket and straight legs with drawstring hems.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with reversible sequins on the front (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins), and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Knee-length dress in soft, patterned jersey with a V-neck and wrapover top that has a practical inner top for easier nursing access. Short sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and a skirt with a sewn-in wrapover and decorative ties at one side. Unlined.
Long-sleeved, polo-neck jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend.
Vest top in ribbed organic cotton jersey.
Straight-style cardigan in a soft knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front and long, flared raglan sleeves.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Short dress in a crinkled weave with inset lace trims and a small V-neck with ties at the neckline. Seam at the waist and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Long-sleeved top in soft fabric with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline and hem. Press-stud on one shoulder.

Small bucket bag with a suede upper section and a lower section in braided water hyacinth. One zipped inner compartment and a magnetic press-stud fastening at the top. The bag has a long metal shoulder strap but can also be carried as a handbag. Lined. Size 9x16.5x23 cm.
